<title level="1" pfs="Limited">[Charlatan](/NPCs.aspx?ID=889)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Charlatans use pretense and misdirection to swindle money and other valuables from the credulous and confused. Selling snake oil (literally or figuratively), distracting marks to pick their pockets, or faking mediumship are classic grifts.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/NPCs/Criminal_Charlatan.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Charlatan](/NPCs.aspx?ID=889)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 209</row>

**Perception** +6

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +8, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +11, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +9, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +7, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +11, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +7, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +8, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +8, [Underworld Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +3

**Con** +0

**Int** +2

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Versatile Performance** The charlatan can use [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) instead of [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) to [Make an Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=50) and instead of [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53). They can also use an acting Performance instead of [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) to [Impersonate](/Actions.aspx?ID=46).

**Items**
[Disguise Kit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=19), [lute](/Equipment.aspx?ID=37), [Sap](/Weapons.aspx?ID=37), [Shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43), [Thieves' Tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=58)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +5 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +10 

</row>

**HP** 40

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shortsword +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d6+2 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
sap +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188)),
**Damage** 1d6+2 bludgeoning

**Occult Spontaneous Spells** DC 20, attack +10
- **Cantrips (2nd)**
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Ghost Sound](/Spells.aspx?ID=132), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190), [Prestidigitation](/Spells.aspx?ID=229)
- **1st**
[Illusory Disguise](/Spells.aspx?ID=159), [Magic Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=178), [Unseen Servant](/Spells.aspx?ID=352), [Ventriloquism](/Spells.aspx?ID=356) (3 slots)
- **2nd**
[Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [Illusory Disguise](/Spells.aspx?ID=159), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) (2 slots)

**Bard Composition Spells** DC 19, 1 Focus Point
- **Cantrips (1st)**
[Inspire Courage](/Spells.aspx?ID=386)
- **1st**
[Counter Performance](/Spells.aspx?ID=381)

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   The charlatan deals an extra 1d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

</column>
